title: Manage Project Budget and Variance
description: A development project manager must track construction costs against the budget and report on any variances.

tasks.description: Input all contractor invoices and change orders into the project accounting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: All project costs are accurately recorded.

tasks.description: Generate a monthly budget variance report that compares actual costs to the budgeted amounts for each line item.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report highlighting any cost overruns or savings is produced.

tasks.description: Analyze the variances to identify the root cause of any significant overruns and present the findings to the project stakeholders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an explanation for budget variances and suggests corrective actions.
